name: Xeno Run
description:
Title: Xeno Run

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer/Endless Runner

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: You play as an alien that runs endlessly through a spaceship. Try not to fall!

Instructions: 'Up' to start and jump. 'Enter' to restart.

Game Designer: Erielle Seigel
